resources.string: Tap Here to Scan QR Code

Onspot bridges the gap between product & consumer to protect against counterfeiting. Onspot\'s MVP (Mobile Verification Platform) gives helpful, on-demand, real time product information. It also helps consumers to verify the integrity of the products they purchase.

"Scan QR Code : Scan QR Codes to obtain full product information
 History : View details about your app usage, past verification and scans.
 About Us : A Brief note about the OnSpot, Consumer Affairs, Govt. of India and Onspot Solutions Pvt Ltd.
 Settings : Change your personal information such as Name, Email
 FAQ : Have a question?. Check out the Frequently Asked Questions section.
"

" 1. Why are my personal details required to use OnSpot App? -> a. Your personal details are required for registration purpose. Your detail is strictly confidential and not shared with anybody. b. Your mobile number is used to send back an authentication code which completes your registration towards usage of the app. In case you have activated Do Not Disturb on your SIM, your email will be used to send back the authentication code. c. Your email is also used for communicating important messages between MINISTRY OF CONSUMER AFFAIRS and yourself.
2. What does an INVALID response mean? -> INVALID response means that the product you have purchased could not be validated against the database.
3. What if I change my Mobile Device? -> When you change your device, please ensure that you have forwarded all your purchases related responses to your alternative email id for future reference. If your SIM is still the same, you would be required to download and install the App, follow the registration procedures and you would be able to use the App again.
4. What if I change my SIM Phone Number? -> To continue using the App, you are requested to register your new phone number with us. If your mobile device is still the same, you can go to Settings and update your records with the new phone number. You will receive an activation code and will be able to use the App like before.
5. How do I change my preferred language? -> The Jaago Grahak Jaago App is available, both in English and Hindi. While using the App., at any point of time, you , the user can go to Settings and change the language.. All contents in the Jaago Grahak Jaago App will be displayed in your preferred language. This will be applicable on the interactive elements too such as buttons, alert's etc."
You have earned 100 points so far by using OnSpot Mobile app
